title: Chicken ruby curry
ingredients: ['2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 teaspoon chilli flakes or chopped fresh chillies', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 dessertspoon grated root ginger', '1 red pepper, chopped', '2 onions, diced', '2 large chicken breast fillets, chopped into small chunks', '1 tin green lentils', '1 tin tomato soup', '250ml water', '150g to 180g rice of your choice', 'chopped fresh coriander, to serve (optional )']
